ygData.subject: RE: Hey all
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a paladin (I can t remember his name, I m sure someone else has it) in the paladin guild which is behind the clerics guild in north Kaladim. Give him
ygData.messageBody:
There is a paladin (I can't remember his name, I'm sure someone else has it)
in the paladin guild which is behind the clerics guild in north Kaladim.
Give him four bone chips for money, exp and an item. I used this to level my
cleric from 10th to 13th. Its a great quest when combined with the camping
of the dwarf skeletons around the skeleton tower and the druid ruins in
Butcher Block. You can give him bone chips in stacks of 20 but in
desperation to make money I always just gave him 4 at a time.

Heisler
18th level Cleric of Brell
Armigers of Mirth

-----Original Message-----
From: Walt Zimbeck [mailto:wzimbeck@...]
Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 9:05 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Hey all


From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>

I will check out the Ruins for sure now. What is this about the Paladin
Guild and skeleton bones?

Yilari, 10th level Cleric of Tunare



> From: "Alan Raboy" <ARaboy@...>
>
> At level 10, I was soloing at the Undead Ruins in BB. If the zone is as
empty as you say,
> you can level rather quickly by beating up on the dwarf skeletons there,
collecting
> their bones and taking them to the Paladin guild for more xp and loot.
This is better
> than the tower because none of the mobs are linked. Also, if you
> are able to find a tank to group with, the Goblin Warrior camp is good xp
at your level
> if the chessboard is camped.
>
>
> >
